title: Such Development shall be permitted in Industrial Zone only after leaving amenity space as per Regulation No
clause_text: Such Development shall be permitted in Industrial Zone only after leaving amenity space as per Regulation No.4.8.1. However, no premium shall be charged for allowing residential use in the form of PMAY in Industrial Zone.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
